name: Verify Copyright text, external links in footer and buttons in a right section of Login page

steps.name: Given I go to OOM Login page
Then I verify that footer link "Terms of Use" opens in a new tab and redirects user to proper page
And I verify that footer link "Privacy Policy" opens in a new tab and redirects user to proper page
And I verify that link from right banner section "Refer now" opens in a new tab and redirects user to proper page
And I verify that link from right banner section "Learn more" opens in a new tab and redirects user to proper page
